paddings: for each padding in paddings, padding_length=2

if(mode='reflect') then for each padding in paddings, padding[0]>=0 and padding[0]<=x_shape[i]-1 and padding[1]>=0 and padding[1]<=x_shape[i]-1 else for each padding in paddings, padding[0]>=0 and padding[0]<=x_shape[i] and padding[1]>=0 and padding[1]<=x_shape[i]
